block.p: American League YANKEES--Activated LHP Allen Watson from the 15-day disabled list. Sent RHP Darrell Einertson to Columbus of the International League. ANAHEIM ANGELS--Recalled RHP Seth Etherton from Edmonton of the PCL. BALTIMORE ORIOLES--Announced the resignation of Paul Zwaska, groundskeeper. Promoted assistant groundskeeper Al Capitos to groundskeeper. CLEVELAND INDIANS--Placed OF-INF Jolbert Cabrera on the inactive list. Recalled OF Dave Roberts from Buffalo of the International League. OAKLAND ATHLETICS--Released OF Rodney Clifton from Modesto of the California League.

American League YANKEES--Activated LHP Allen Watson from the 15-day disabled list. Sent RHP Darrell Einertson to Columbus of the International League. ANAHEIM ANGELS--Recalled RHP Seth Etherton from Edmonton of the PCL. BALTIMORE ORIOLES--Announced the resignation of Paul Zwaska, groundskeeper. Promoted assistant groundskeeper Al Capitos to groundskeeper. CLEVELAND INDIANS--Placed OF-INF Jolbert Cabrera on the inactive list. Recalled OF Dave Roberts from Buffalo of the International League. OAKLAND ATHLETICS--Released OF Rodney Clifton from Modesto of the California League.

National League CHICAGO CUBS--Placed SS Ricky Gutierrez on the 15-day disabled. Called up INF Chad Meyers from Iowa of the PCL. HOUSTON ASTROS--Placed OF Roger Cedeno on the 15-day disabled list. Recalled OF Lance Berkman from New Orleans of the PCL. LOS ANGELES DODGERS--Sent RHP Orel Hershiser to San Bernardino of the California League. Activated RHP Mike Fetters from the 15-day disabled list. SAN DIEGO PADRES--Signed 1B Ryan Klesko to three-year contract extension through 2004.

Women's National Basketball Association LIBERTY--Announced the retirement of C Kym Hampton. WASHINGTON MYSTICS--Signed G Itoro Umoh-Coleman and C Nyree Roberts. Waived G Kellie Jolly Harper and F Nakia Sanford.

United States Basketball League NEW JERSEY SHORECATS--Placed F Tunji Awojobi and G John Giraldo on the inactive list. Signed G-F Ray Tutt and C William Cunningham. BROOKLYN KINGS--Released F Sean Simpson. Placed G Adrian Autry and G Chuck Barker on the inactive list. Signed G Greg Jones, F Marvin Rogers and F Justice Sueing.
National Football League JETS--Agreed to terms with TE Anthony Becht on a five-year contract. TENNESSEE TITANS--Signed LB Terry Killens to a two-year contract.
National Hockey League COLUMBUS BLUE JACKETS--Claimed D Jamie Heward off waivers from the Islanders.

Major League Soccer D.C. UNITED--Signed F Pete Marino. Waived F Michael Burke. TAMPA BAY MUTINY--Traded F Raul Diaz Arce to D.C. United for two first-round 2001 SuperDraft picks, one 2002 second-round SuperDraft pick and MF John Maessner.

IONA--Named Lonny Unger men's assistant soccer coach. RIDER--Named Kevin Finefrock part-time men's assistant basketball coach. SOUTHAMPTON--Named Cassie Arroyo softball coach, Ray MacLean men's and women's volleyball coach and Glenn Nathan women's tennis coach
